title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 87.39 - Salaries or fees to officers or directors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 87.39 - Salaries or fees to officers or directors

State Regulations

No hospital shall pay any salaries or fees to any director or trustee, except that salaries or fees may be paid to officers of the board, directors or trustees for services actually performed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
87.39

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
